thread.title: ‘No Evidence’ Of Collusion Between Trump And Russia According To Chairman Of House Intelligence Committee
thread.title_full: ‘No Evidence’ Of Collusion Between Trump And Russia According To Chairman Of House Intelligence Committee

author: Andrew Kerr
title: ‘No Evidence’ Of Collusion Between Trump And Russia According To Chairman Of House Intelligence Committee
text:
Minister On Trump: ‘He Does Care About The Poor’ 
“Up to speed on everything I have up to this morning. No evidence of collusion,” Nunes added. 
On Monday , the House Intelligence Committee will hear testimony from FBI Director James Comey and National Security Agency Director Mike Rogers about Russia’s alleged efforts to interfere in the U.S. elections. Advertisement - story continues below 
While Nunes has yet to see any evidence of collusion between Trump associates and Russia, he believes it’s time the American people learn the extent of Russia’s efforts to influence U.S. elections. 
“We are excited about this, because for the first time the American people and all the political parties now are paying attention to the threat that Russia poses,” Nunes said. 
“We will highlight the fact that we know that the Russians were trying to get involved in our campaign, like they have for many decades. They’re also trying to get involved in campaigns around the globe,” the congressman continued. “It will be good to highlight that.” 
Nunes also hopes to use the hearing to address allegations that the intelligence community leaked information to the press with the intention to harm the Trump administration politically. Advertisement - story continues below
